title: MoreApp - Sending Digital Forms
description:
The tool focus on replacing paper forms in the workplace with a digital tool.
MoreApp, the application, is a tool for employee to fill in forms on their job. These forms can be inspection forms, HR forms, declaration forms. You name it, you can fill it in with that app!
